title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 90.2 - Corporate governance framework
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 90.2 - Corporate governance framework

State Regulations

An insurer shall adopt a corporate governance framework that shall be appropriate for the nature, scale, and complexity of the insurer. An insurer may satisfy this section if it is a member of a system and the system has a corporate governance framework. Notes

ยง
90.2

Adopted

New

York State Register August 19, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 33, eff. 9/18/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
